allOf.description: Models access to an API scope

Required.description: Specifies whether the user can de-select the scope on the consent screen. Defaults to false.

Emphasize.description: Specifies whether the consent screen will emphasize this scope. Use this setting for sensitive or important scopes. Defaults to false.

Resource.description: Models the common data of API and identity resources.

Enabled.description: Indicates if this resource is enabled. Defaults to true.

Name.description: The unique name of the resource.

ShowInDiscoveryDocument.description: Specifies whether this scope is shown in the discovery document. Defaults to true.

UserClaims.description: List of associated user claims that should be included when this resource is requested.

Properties.description: Gets or sets the custom properties for the resource.
